channel.title: Comments on: SMS services in the US

item.title: By: mcutler
item.dc:creator: mcutler
item.description:
Hi Gordon:
I just wanted to personally invite you to try out 80108 (http://www.80108.com/friends). While we have a handful of local channels in Seattle -- with more on the way! -- I'd recommend weather and Seattle:KidStuff as good starting points. Here's what we sent out this weekend:
[Kids] Catch a free jam by local faves Recess Monkey this Sat. at Island Books, and pick up some summer reading while you're at it. Reply R for more. Recess: They're teachers turned kiddie band; their song "Busy Squirrel" sounds just like The Postal Service. Many nods to the Beatles, too. Reply I for info. The Recess Monkeys @ Island Books, 3014 78th Ave SE, Mercer Island. Sat. 6/9, 11-11:30. Free. Ages 3 and up. 206-232-6920
Check out http://www.80108.com/company/correspondents.php to learn some more about Barb K, our correspondent for Seattle:KidStuff. Aside from standard text messaging rates, the service itself is free. I'd love your honest feedback: good, bad, or indifferent.
Thanks! Matt Cutler co-founder, 80108 Media
item.content:encoded:
Hi Gordon:

I just wanted to personally invite you to try out 80108 (http://www.80108.com/friends). While we have a handful of local channels in Seattle — with more on the way! — I’d recommend weather and Seattle:KidStuff as good starting points. Here’s what we sent out this weekend:

[Kids] Catch a free jam by local faves Recess Monkey this Sat. at Island Books, and pick up some summer reading while you’re at it. Reply R for more.
Recess: They’re teachers turned kiddie band; their song “Busy Squirrel” sounds just like The Postal Service. Many nods to the Beatles, too. Reply I for info.
The Recess Monkeys @ Island Books, 3014 78th Ave SE, Mercer Island. Sat. 6/9, 11-11:30. Free. Ages 3 and up. 206-232-6920

Check out http://www.80108.com/company/correspondents.php to learn some more about Barb K, our correspondent for Seattle:KidStuff. Aside from standard text messaging rates, the service itself is free. I’d love your honest feedback: good, bad, or indifferent.

Thanks!
Matt Cutler
co-founder, 80108 Media
